title: Strengthening System Design Practical Competencies: Problem-Solving Micro-Credentialing for Mobile-Based Science Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply scientific analysis methods in problem-based scenarios reflecting real-world job contexts.
Learners maintain learning motivation through gamification elements and engage in self-directed learning for at least five hours per week.
Learners can explain complex scientific concepts with over 80% comprehension using storytelling-structured content.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
